infos.value: Hourne's forces have retreated, I see.
I knew you could manage, "Whisper." You continue to prove your love for me.
After being subject to such an onslaught, it is only natural.
I must prepare to give chase to Hourne...
If you push yourself any further, your body is likely to break down.
Come, let us return. I must reconstruct your corporeal frame.
Correct. To our castle. Ours and only ours.
I have been informed that Machérie has been imprisoned within Leonis Castle.
Sterne is to travel there to keep the people of the castle in line.
Such will allow us to maintain control of Leonis Castle—even should Robb launch an assault.
Let us be on our way.
